    • Constructor Detail

      • FallingCircle

        public FallingCircle(java.lang.String filename,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int r,
                     long time)
        Creates a new falling circle
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the image file to be used for the circle
        x - the x value of the falling circle
        y - the y value of the falling circle
        r - the length of the radius of the falling circle
        time - the time the falling circle should be clicked

      • FallingCircle

        public FallingCircle(java.lang.String filename,

                     int y,
                     int r,
                     long time,
                     java.awt.Color c)
        Creates a new falling circle
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the image file to be used for the circle
        x - the x value of the falling circle
        y - the y value of the falling circle
        r - the length of the radius of the falling circle
        time - the time the falling circle should be clicked
        c - the color of the falling circle
